hero.title: The AI resident portal for modern developments.
hero.subtitle: Instant onboarding, intelligent support, and a unified knowledge engine for every home you build — powered by automation, NFC activation, and a multi-tenant developer dashboard.

problem.title: A Modern Multi-Tenant Platform Architected for Scale.
bullets: Analytics layer (query trends, knowledge gaps, monthly reporting)
GDPR + EU data residency + audit logs

solution.title: Built for Developers. Loved by Residents.
benefits: Premium, modern resident experience from day one

steps.title: AI welcomes the resident
steps.description: By name and answers any home-specific question.

steps.title: Developer dashboard
steps.description: Manages documents, updates, and analytics across all schemes.

features.title: Everything you need, nothing you don't

items.title: Resident Portal
items.description: AI assistant, manuals, drawings, warranties, POI mapping, community tools.

items.title: Developer Command Center
items.description: Manage multiple schemes, upload documents, push updates, global edits, role-based access, analytics.

items.title: Handover Automation
items.description: NFC/QR activation, welcome journeys, templated onboarding, scheme cloning.

items.title: AI Knowledge Engine
items.description: RAG ingestion, multi-phrase intent mapping, issue categorisation, predictive FAQs.

items.title: Multi-language
items.description: Serve international buyers in their language.

items.title: Role-based access
items.description: Different views for buyers, residents, and agents.

audience.title: Built for everyone in the property ecosystem

developers.title: Developers
developers.description: Reduce support overhead, impress buyers, and close deals faster with 24/7 AI assistance.

agents.title: Managing Agents
agents.description: Empower residents with instant answers and reduce repetitive inquiries.

residents.title: Residents
residents.description: Get answers instantly—no waiting, no hassle.

dashboard.title: Developer Engagement Model
dashboard.description: Discovery & data ingest → Scheme setup (minutes) → AI knowledge build → NFC/QR deployment → Go-live → Monthly insights

security.title: Security & Compliance
bullets: No LLM training on customer data

security_compliance.title: Security & Compliance
items: No LLM training on customer data

items.question: Where is my data stored?
items.answer: All data is stored in secure, enterprise-grade data centers. We offer EU hosting options for GDPR compliance.

items.question: How quickly can I launch?
items.answer: Most clients launch within 48 hours. Upload your content, customize branding, and you're live.

items.question: Do you support multiple languages?
items.answer: Yes, OpenHouse AI supports 50+ languages out of the box, with automatic translation capabilities.

items.question: Can I white-label the assistant?
items.answer: Enterprise plans include full white-label options with custom domains and branding.

items.question: How do QR and NFC work?
items.answer: We provide QR codes and NFC tags that link directly to your assistant. Perfect for show homes and marketing materials.
